DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to information for a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment giving permission to obtain a substance, or portion of material for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment giving permission to obtain a substance, or portion of material for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: I agree to have my specimen(s
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to have my specimen(s) collected and I agree that my specimen sample(s) and related information may be used for the laboratory study(ies) described above.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to have their specimen collected and agree to have the specimen samples and related health information used for the laboratory study described in the protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to have their specimen collected and agree to have the specimen samples and related health information used for the laboratory studies described in the protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG OPEN CheckList
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient consented to central review of their post-operative lymph node specimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to allow blood and urine samples to be collected and used for all purposes described in the sample consent form except biobanking?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed that his/her sample(s) and related information may be used for the laboratory study described in the protocol.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have tissue specimen(s) collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to have their specimen collected (prior to treatment and post-progression and/or post-mortem) and agrees to have the specimen samples and related health information used for the laboratory studies described in the protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to have their specimen(s) collected at timepoints specified in the protocol and any said specimen samples and related health information used for the protocol prescribed laboratory studies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: OPEN Checklist
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my samples and related health information may be collected and used for the laboratory studies described above.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to have their samples and related health information kept in a Biobank for use in unknown future health research

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient agrees that samples and related health information may be used for laboratory research studies

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have specimen(s) collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to allow tissue and blood samples and related information to be taken for known exploratory studies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to allow blood samples and related information to be taken for known exploratory studies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have tissue and blood samples collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample and related information.

DataElement.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 9/13/22 added AQT and OID, CCTG for CCTG cjl;
